title: I knew the promise of an entire BioWare game remade inside another, older BioWare game was too good to be true, but what I found was even weirder than I imagined
description: It's like a weird Baldur's ROM hack, and swipes assets from a much more recent Obsidian RPG?

description: I mean, it has the dog which is all you need, really.

title: The Viper is Final Fantasy 14's newest class, with tons of flair and dual swords that can be fused together
description: It'll be one of two classes to be added in Dawntrail.

title: Battlefield 2042 is finally having a little moment thanks to 2 years of updates and a big discount
description: Battlefield 2042 continues to put up strong Steam concurrents despite the end of its free weekend.
